Name: Olivarrier Baby Organic Ground Squ Squ Lotion
Label:
Ingredients from packaging:
Water, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Camellia Sinensis Leaf, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Cetyl Palmitate, Sclerotium Gum, Arachidyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Sorbitan Palmitate, Behenyl Alcohol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Arachidyl Glucoside, Squalane, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Pyrus Communis (Pear) Fruit Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Hedera Helix (Ivy) Leaf/Stem Extract, Iris Florentina Root Extract, Vegetable Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Citric Acid, Glucose, Propanediol, Ceramide NP, Phytosphingosine, Glyceryl Caprylate, Centella Asiatica Extract
Warnings from packaging:
1. Stop using the product at the following symptoms, and consult with a dermatologist as the symptom would deteriorate if used continuously.
A) Symptoms such as red spots, swelling, itching or irritation during the use.
B) The above symptoms on the applied part due to direct sunlight.
2. Do not use the product on the part with a scar, eczema or dermatitis.
3. Precautions at Storage & Handling.
A) Close the cover after use.
B) Keep out of reach of the children.
C) Do not store in a place of high temperature, low temperature of under direct sunlight.
